about_the_game:
Gemion Function is a fast-paced fighting game that combines a hectic 4-player battle system along with the classic motion input control system of traditional 2D fighting games.

  • 4 characters each with their own special moves, combos, and character-specific "unique movement" actions that can be done on the floor or in the air. More characters to be added over time

  • 6 stages using 2.5D graphics with 3D models for characters and projectiles on a 2D fighting plane, powered by Unreal Engine. More stages will also be added over time

  • Team battle system supporting up to 4 players (1v1, 1v2, or 2v2)

  • Smooth online play with rollback netcode via integration with the "GGPO rollback network SDK"

  • Online lobby functionality with Steam API supporting actions such as:

    • Creating public and private lobbies

    • Sending and accepting invites from Steam chat

    • Searching for public lobbies

  • Resource management with a shared team super meter for universal actions such as EX Special Moves (aka enhanced moves) and Burst (aka combo breakers)

  • Classic control scheme with inputs for special moves for quarter-circles, half-circles, dragon punch, and more
